about_the_game:
Send your mercenaries to search abandoned factories or have your heroes break into a power plant controlled by an evil corporation with the CyberCity Industrial Sector Tiles pack! PVGames is here with another addition to their CyberCity series, this time focusing on grimy concrete and metal beams that can build warehouses, industrial parks, and more! With over 1,900 tiles to choose from you can make exterior and interior maps to fill your busy factory districts.

Designed for you to create parallax maps, each object comes in 8 different directions so you can set up your map to look just how you want and make it enjoyable for your players to explore! Also included are 31 full buildings and 24 large building pieces so you can fill out your map with more buildings to make your cities feel even larger and more alive. So if you’ve been needing to build some warehouses for your heroes to visit or you just want to make your CyberCity-filled game even more varied, pick up the CyberCity Industrial Sector Tiles pack!

Contents:

* Buildings, factories, and warehouses
* Modular building interior pieces including floors, walls, and stairs
* Doors, catwalks, ducts, vents, and other building accessories
* Industrial machinery, robotic arms, fans, conduits, and more
* Industrial greeble pieces and technological pieces
* Industrial objects such as oil cans, barrels lockers, pallet jacks, and more
* Industrial furniture such as workbenches, stooles, shelves, and more
* And much more!

*Please note that the tiles in this pack are not formatted as tilesheets. They are all individual PNG graphics.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
